name: Sharon Feldstein
role: Additional Crew, Costume and Wardrobe Department
summary: Sharon Feldstein. Costume Department: Chains of Gold. Sharon Feldstein is known for Chains of Gold (1990), Taxi (1978) and Heart of the City (1986). She is married to Richard Feldstein. They have three children.
